title: An interesting blackletter graffiti
content:
This is down in the flood control channel that runs through LA. The first image show where I saw it, and the second is 12 times zoom.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023161938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/example2_4537.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023161938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/example_5734.jpg)

I have some more interesting lettering samples from Saturday I’ll be posting.

 [‹ designers who think they know it all](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023161938/http:/typophile.com/node/20902 "Go to previous forum topic") [letter written in Sútterlin needs translation ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023161938/http:/typophile.com/node/20887 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fontplayer
